title: Ali's Film Club: The Devil Wears Prada - With Amelia Dimoldenberg
content: Ali catches up with interviewer extraordinaire and deadpan delight Amelia Dimoldenberg - of Chicken Shop Dates fame (and much more) - as they talk shop, sharing stories of speaking to famous people and somehow getting away with it. Oh, and talk about The Devil Wears Prada, can't forget that, as the Ali Plumb's Film Club choice for this week. All right, everyone. Gird your loins!
